channel.title: Grats davidude36
channel.description:
grats on getting community member, you're a good guy :) i made this song for you; it tells about his love towards these forums, literally.
Damn baby Just don't understand what went wrong I gave you my heart I gave you my soul I gave you..
As a matter of fact I was the one who said I love you first It was about 2 years ago, don't act like you don't know I was sitting and chatting with you Cause, we couldn't be alone See your ISP knew I was something else, it knew i was a botnet Back then we were in the same LAN network; and that's your favorite excuse Growin' up I was a fool; and I can't lie I'm missing you Listen and don't trip I think i need a bottle with a genie in it Here's my wish list
First one, I would create an IP changing love Second one, I'll take you and fill you up Third one, but I don't need a lot of wishes cause I'll be okay if I get CM
If I had one wish, we would be best friends Love would never end, it would just begin If I had one wish, you would be my poo Promise to love you, trust me I'll trust you If I had one wish, we would play moparscape Makin' love all day, have us a babyscape now If I had one wish, I'd make you my whole life And you'd be my wife, make it right this time
Now tell me is this the only way I can get you right back here If so than searchin' I'll go, then your IP will be mine Then you'll be loving me, holding me, pinging me So baby don't tell me what I'm feeling its make believe I swear if I lose a second chance with you I wouldn't know what to do I'd probably check myself into some kind of clinic I couldn't be alone because without you I'm sick Here's my wish list
First one, I would create a small forum for us Second one, I'll take your account and max out the rep Third one, I'd make you be mine, buy a domain _____________________________________________________ ye i leeched from somewher but i edited it so 100% credits me. ty.

item.title: Grats davidude36
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote="``jason, post:37, topic:185200"][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=246944.msg2102527#msg2102527 date=1205227410]

It’s strange, warnings are actually harder to get than rep. I’ve said multiple offensive things to people. And I’ve gotten off scott free. But if I were to say… something remotely funny about someone a lot of people hate. rep++ x8.

I seem to get them every time I open my mouth, I beg to differ.
[/quote]
Same here, i have been with the forums for about a year now and i only got 2 reps :0[/quote]

You know you have thought about rep since you joined here. FastBawlz statement didn’t apply to you.

Read full topic

item.title: Grats davidude36
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:82, topic:200437”][quote author=cooper link=topic=265117.msg2199228#msg2199228 date=1208677535]

I didn’t know who you were, and I still thought you were a prick. Changing your name doesn’t do shit. If I took a dump, and called it ice cream. It’s just shit with the name ice cream. We’ve already seen what changing your name does (Tranquill).

Who was/is Tranquil?
[/quote]

Zilchuary.[/quote]
Then a sex change must have happened too?
Because I always thought Zilchuary was a male.

Read full topic
